author: Chris Baynes, Chris Baynes
title: Coronavirus: How countries around world are easing their lockdowns
description: Nations that hope they have weathered the pandemic's first wave are now looking to re-open their societies
content:
Falling rates of death and new infections have been welcomed as the light at the end of the tunnel in some of the countries most badly hit by the coronavirus pandemic.
Several European nations are now looking at easing their lockdowns, amid hopes they may ha… [+8904 chars]
